text: Yeah, refreshed, restarted, and re-done the entire process, it’s the same. I can see only the production extension.
Is there any way I can enforce local dev mode?

For <https://app.HubSpot.com/docs/529308/doc/platform/ui-extension-components#association-table|Association Table> - could I do anything on the filter side so it only shows the associated object with a specific association label I want?
I’ll say update the but I guess you’ve probably tried it so try uninstalling and reinstalling the cli.
Try logging something out and see where it comes out. In production or sandbox logs
I’m not getting anything in local dev. I’ll try to uninstall and reinstall everything.
no, it doesn’t show anywhere — this is for a change/console.log I didn’t deploy to production of course.
Hi <@U02CS2Q38QG> :wave-yeti:, when `hs project dev` is running, if you go to `<http://localhost:5173/extensions>` in your browser, what do you get?
Another thing to check is that the local dev mode is portal specific, so the portal/account id you select when running `hs project dev` will need to match the portal you navigate to in the browser
